title: (x) sarahealth.com - FF Meta {Yves}
content:
Hi Can anyone identify the font from the banner at the top ("sarahealth.com") of this webpage:   
 [http://www.sarahealth.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124735/http:/www.sarahealth.com/)   
   
Thanks for your help   
   
Meredith ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124735im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/34768.gif)
author: sarahealth

comments.content: Ooops! Darn!! I jumped the gun. You're right Yves. I knew it was familiar, but picked the wrong familiar sans. My bad.

WOW! Thanks... you guys are amazing! You wouldn't believe how long I have been trying to figgure this out (but then again... I am a philosophy grad student and by no means a font expert!) Thanks so much for your help!   
   
Merediht
